hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Back Left Bombable Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #3# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #gold#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Bomb Bag#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Light Arrows# and #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Water Temple#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #the Ice Arrows# and #a Deku Stick#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Lens of Truth#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Biggoron Sword#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Side Room Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #the Serenade of Water#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Compass#.
